article: A school teacher decided to let her class play a game. The teacher told each child in the class to bring along a plastic bag containing a few _ . Each tomato will be given a name of a person that the child _ , so the number of tomatoes that a child will put in the plastic bag will depend on the number of people the child hates. So when the day came, every _ brought some tomatoes. Some had two; some three while some up to five tomatoes. The teacher then told the children to _ with them the tomatoes in the plastic _ wherever they go. Days after days passed by, and the children started to complain due to the _ smell let out by the rotten tomatoes. Besides, those having more tomatoes had to carry _ bags. After 1 week, the children were relieved because the game had finally ended. The teacher asked: "How did you _ while carrying the tomatoes with you for 1 _ ?" The children let out their frustrations and started _ of the trouble that they had to go through having to carry the heavy and _ tomatoes wherever they go. Then the teacher told them the hidden meaning behind the _ . "This is exactly the _ when you carry your hatred for somebody inside your heart. The unpleasant smell of hatred will pollute your _ and you will carry it with you wherever you go. If you cannot tolerate the smell of rotten tomatoes for just 1 week, can you imagine what is it like to have the smell of hatred in your heart for your lifetime?" So _ others is that best attitude to take!
